=== Routing and References Testing

Test was done by checking every button and like that was available on the platform to see if it routed to the correct page or section.

|===

| Issue | Status

| All Comminities buttons that work send to the correct page/section.
| ❌ (Some communities buttons send you to a blank page)

| All Tournaments buttons that work send to the correct page/section.
| ✅

| All profiles buttons that work send to the correct page/section.
| ✅

| All Notifications buttons that work send to the correct page/section.
| ✅

|All Buttons of the Team Section send to the correct page/section.
| ✅

|===

== Summary

All routing and references available are working as expected. There are some buttons that are not connected yet but that is due to the feature not being available yet.
